institution: Regents of the University of Michigan - Ann Arbor
award_title: Development of Immobilized Chiral Bronsted Acids and Their Exploration in Asymmetric Catalysis
subject: catalyst tuning workflows
body:
Hi Pavel,

I've been thinking about how chemists designing recyclable catalysts handle the iterative process of testing polymer modifications and reaction conditionsâ€”seems like there's a lot of computational trial-and-error that could be reused across labs but usually just lives in someone's notebook.

That's what got us building Ouro. We help researchers package their computational workflows and datasets so they become modular pieces others can actually build on.

Would you be open to a quick chat in the new year?

Hope you're having a good holiday season.

Cheers,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
